text: Kim Kardashian West would “ feel safe and comfortable ” having a longer stay in Paris. The reality TV star returned to the French capital earlier this year to support her husband Kanye West at the Louis Vuitton spring / summer 2019 menswear fashion show, and it helped her overcome her fears, as it was the first time she ’ d been back since her hotel robbery at gunpoint in 2016. Speaking on “ Keeping Up With The Kardashians, ” she reflected, “ I don ’ t think I ’ ll ever really forget my experiences in Paris — the good or the bad — and I think that ’ s okay. “ It all has made me who I am. Thinking about it, I think I could go back and spend more time and feel safe and comfortable. ” Kim, 37, decided
